Interface com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.IManifestParserObserver
Inherited members: ShowHide
Deprecated: ShowHide
View: ClientSubclassPackageImplementation
com.penthera.virtuososdk.client

Interface IManifestParserObserver

  • public interface IManifestParserObserver
    This interface provides a configurable mechanism for altering the output of the manifest parser before the Download 2 Go SDK begins downloading an asset. It provides methods to alter the URLs of each segment within the manifest, and update the asset properties prior to the asset being added to the queue. The class implementing IManifestParserObserver is instantiated within the service process of the SDK and is called directly within the parsing process. It may be called when the app is in the background as the result of manifest parsing continuing after the app is backgrounded. It will only be called when the SDK determines that the device is online. The IManifestParserObserver is provided to the engine through the IBackgroundProcessingManager interface, which itself is registered via the Android manifest.
    • Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      didParseSegment 
      abstract java.lang.String didParseSegment(ISegmentedAsset asset, ISegment segment)
      The SDK has parsed a segment for download.
      java.lang.String didParseSegment(ISegmentedAsset asset, ISegment segment)
      The SDK has parsed a segment for download. This method gives the enclosing application a chance to modify the download URL prior to it being queued for download. This allows you to append custom security tokens to the URL, or make any other manipulations that may be required prior to download. If you do not need to make any changes to the URL, you should return the unmodified URL from the segment's getRemotePath() method.
      Parameters:
      asset - The asset from which the segment is parsed.
      segment - The asset segment parsed from download.
      Returns:
      The modified URL to download for this segment.
      See Also:
      ISegment
      willAddToQueue 
      abstract void willAddToQueue(ISegmentedAsset segmentedAsset, IAssetManager assetManager, Context context)
      The SDK has finished parsing the asset and is about to add the asset to the download queue.
      void willAddToQueue(ISegmentedAsset segmentedAsset, IAssetManager assetManager, Context context)
      The SDK has finished parsing the asset and is about to add the asset to the download queue. This method gives the enclosing application a chance to modify the asset's configuration options (E.G. start window, end window, asset download limit) before the asset is added to the download queue and downloading begins.
      Parameters:
      segmentedAsset - Generated segmented asset.
      assetManager - An asset manager instance which can be used for saving any changes
      context - A context that can be useful when fetching resources to process the add to queue action
